Projects
Featured Project
Mini Game Website
A sleek and fun mini game website. It features 4-5 unique games and its own virtual currency system. The site includes both dark and light themes for user preference. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and using Bootstrap for a responsive design, it looks great on any device. Check it out and play around with the themes and games!
